name: Get Country From IP
author: Adeel Sarfraz

sections.description:
Get Country From IP will display the name and flag of the country based on the visitor’s IP address.
The visitor’s IP address is POSTed to the URL (https://www.adeelsarfaraz.com/ip/) and the name and flag are displayed at the location where the shortcode has been applied.
Please go through the https://www.adeelsarfaraz.com/terms-of-service/ and https://www.adeelsarfaraz.com/privacy-policy-website/ for more details regarding usage of this plugin on your website.
sections.installation: Upload the Get Country From IP plugin to your blog, activate it and place the shortcode in the widget where you wish to display the flag and name of the country. That’s it.

short_description: Get Country From IP as the name suggest displays the name and flag of the country based on the visitor's IP address.
